channel.title: Children on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Children on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Under RFK Jr, CDC skips study on vaccination rates, quietly posts data on drop
item.description: Vaccination rates fell once again as nonmedical exemptions hit a new high.

item.title: The First Widespread Cure for HIV Could Be in Children
item.description: Evidence is growing that some HIV-infected infants, if given antiretroviral drugs early in life, are able to suppress their viral loads to undetectable levels and then come off the medicine.

item.title: The First Widespread Cure for HIV Could Be in Children
item.description: Evidence is growing that some HIV-infected infants, if given antiretroviral drugs early in life, are able to suppress their viral loads to undetectable levels and then come off the medicine.

item.title: Life Without Screens: This Camp Is a Teen’s Worst Nightmare
item.description: Hidden burner phones. Hunger strikes. Runaways. The director of a digital detox program for kids spills about how hard it is to tear kids away from their devices.
